## 🐛 Bug Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## 🔄 Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Execute function '....'
4. See error

## ✅ Expected Behavior
What you expected to happen.

## ❌ Actual Behavior
What actually happened.

- Google Apps Script version: [e.g. Legacy, New]

- Framework Version: [e.g. 1.0.0]
